input.sentences: the friends went to summer camp to learn how to dance .
the friends had a special dance teacher .
during the program the friends were able to get temporary tattoos .
when the friends were taking a break from dancing they played baseball .
at the end of the day the friends were happy with the dance moves they learned .
output.sentences: This summer, I learned a new dance with my friends.
My teachers became my special friends
We all got cool temporary tattoos during a program.
But mostly I played a game where was pretended to be taking stuff away from my friends.
I was so happy I learned those new dance moves.
